cli.description: CLI to facilitate Git usage with natural language (Git Quick Quick)
cli.gitCommandFailed: Git command failed with exit code: %s

commit.description: Creates a commit following Conventional Commits conventions

prompts.enterScope: What is the scope of this change (optional):
prompts.isBreaking: Does this change break backward compatibility?
prompts.continueWithUnstagedChanges: You have unstaged changes. Do you want to continue with the commit?

initProject.description: Initializes a Git repository and creates an empty first commit

formatCommits.description: Format existing commits to conventional commit format

commitTypes.style: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (whitespace, formatting, etc.)
commitTypes.refactor: Code changes that neither fix bugs nor add features
commitTypes.build: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies
commitTypes.ci: Changes to CI configuration and scripts
commitTypes.chore: Other changes that don't modify src or test files
